name: A Girl Story
description:
A GIRL STORY

Alpha version

The story of a little girl. But she doesn't remember her life.

  • Play a quest and 3 maps in this alpha;
  • Listen to the most emotional and relaxing soundtrack ever;
  • Be careful, is an ALPHA. It has many bugs, but i'm fixing day by day;

Hope you enjoy.

PS: The game is in ITALIAN, i'm translating all the scenes in ENGLISH and SPANISH.

Gianmarco Chirico
